title: Nutrition
creator_credit: Dept of Health, Richmond Implementation Unit, Tony Shaddock, Di Adams and Tim Abbott
brief_description: Designed to provide the intellectual disability residential care worker with a basic understanding of nutrition together with techniques and resources to educate residents. It will also enable the identification of special nutritional needs as a result of drugs, medical/physical conditions or behaviours affecting nutrition, to assess the nutritional status of residents through physical appearance, physical/emotional indicators and eating habits, meal planning including shopping lists, food storage and preparation of ingredients. Accompanied by 57p. in-service training manual.
